page.title: 18LOCAL NEWS REPORT
page.content: An ex-pupil of Peterbrook primary and Light Hall secondary schools has recently been chosen to represent the whole area of Birmingham and Warwickshire at an international air cadet camp in Sweden.Robert O'Dell(18 years old)had three interviews and several tests before he was selected from hundreds of applicants. Whilst he is in Sweden he will go sightseeing,visiting various air bases,take part in long hikes through the mountains,see a demonstration at the "Lotto"camp and sleep under canvas in the Arctic Circle,under the Midnight Sun.
